fields.headline: From seaside to soap
fields.bodyText: Name Abigail Fisher. Born April 29, 1975. Occupation Plays feisty district nurse Siobhan Marsden in Emmerdale. Also spells in Heartbeat, The Lakes, and Hollyoaks spin-off Moving On - plus a stint in 2002 in Lancashire county council's lifelong learning department. College Blackpool & the Fylde College. Course BTec national diploma in performing arts. Attended 1992-1993. A tutor recalls: "Abi was an absolute delight. She was very humorous and natural as a performer. You always have great hopes that students will do well, but I was sure Abi would. You could see she had great potential. All the staff enjoyed working with her - and I think that's important. She was very open and applied herself to the work. I watch Emmerdale quite regularly and her character is strongly featured, which is great."
